title: Measurement of Completeness and Timeliness of Linked Electronic Health Record Pharmacy Data for Early Detection of Nonadherence to Breast Cancer Adjuvant …
details: C McPeek, S Paul, J Lieberenz, M Levy - JCO Clinical Cancer Informatics, 2024
abstract: PURPOSE This retrospective cohort study evaluated whether linked electronic health record (EHR) pharmacy data were adequately complete and timely to detect primary nonadherence to breast cancer adjuvant endocrine therapy (AET). MATERIALS AND …
